content.question: At the end of the fourth paragraph, the author most likely uses the word “desolation” to

choices.label: lend gravity to his tone through its negative connotations
enhance his credibility by using a term in a precise, technical way
emphasize his view that stories have the potential to do harm
introduce the main theme that he develops in the following paragraph

content.answer: lend gravity to his tone through its negative connotations

skill.text: Skill 7.A: Explain how word choice, comparisons, and syntax contribute to the specific tone or style of a text.
